item.title: Can refractory alloys help build a sustainable moon base?
item.description: I am a sucker for anything that has to do with space and the cosmos. From trying to understand black holes to the possibility of terraforming Venus is very fascinating to me. So I recently ran across a Kurzgesagt YouTube video (my social media of choice) that talked about building a sustainable colony on the moon [1]. Once I found this video I watched it multiple times, because 1) I enjoy the animation style of Kurzgesagt and 2) the Kurzgesagt team often make videos that allow me to think and imagine how my research can be used for futuristic applications.
